title: tread93
author: tread93
created_time: March 21, 2023, 05:05:52 AMLast edit: March 21, 2023, 07:44:49 AM by tread93
content: Here is my update. You all saw my last post, which I will update with my link to the post *here* (when I get around to it.)So much has recently transpired in my life as of late. I lost my job for one early last month, after investing 7 years of my life building my own 1.5 million dollar book of business for the billionaire I was working for. It felt so good to he freed. When I was let go I honestly wanted to thank my boss for firing me, because I am loyal, I might have stayed there my whole life. It's hard leaving the kingdom you build yourself. This past month and a half I've had the chance to breathe again, to breath life into myself. And to take deep breaths, to meditate and to pray, and to be thankful for what I do have. My family my friends and most importantly my GOD. Jesus Christ my savior and my refuge, my strength and rock. I feel sorry for those who do not have this same HOPE that I possess. This is so key. Do. What. You. Love. Recently I have decided to go ALL IN on my PASSION. Which is: High End Numismatics. I hated my old telecom job, this one is so much better. The potential is there. I am now working for one of the most reputable coin dealers in the business dealing with intrinsically valuable gold and silver graded and raw coinage.I negotiated a 3 month contract on my terms with the owner because I need to make ends meet until I can get this new book of business on its own two legs. THIS IS NOT GOING TO BE EASY AT FIRST. I MADE 190 SALES PHONE CALLS TODAY TO GREAT PAID FOR LEADS WHO HAVE SHOWN INTEREST. SO WISH ME LUCK, IF YOU WOULD. AND FOR THE LOVE OF BEING MADE WHOLE PLEASE DIRECT ONLY YOUR POSITIVE ENERGY MY WAY. THAT IS ALL. Thanks for reading. GOD BLESS YOU ALL. CHEERSTREAD93P.s. Please remember that you are all children of the most high GOD. Whether you know it or not. We literally conduct and produce ELECTRICITY. Act as such and change your life. All you need to do is tune into the right frequency.... These are some of my fire songs I've been listening to in these times in my life, I like all genres and my style of music is so diverse. I hope you like this selection (on a separate note does anyone know of a good "safe link checker https://open.spotify.com/track/7wB5Ktf3MbsbNRgEDI5B80?si=CbK-NcmMQ5WsvkWIR97Q5whttps://open.spotify.com/track/3oo0gWqWLyS7H0tFJsoPk9?si=81J0H3KQSSeoAXHIGahSlQhttps://open.spotify.com/track/3NrMppEmrfhrz9OXaUejp7?si=_Ntuvf2_SySDy9hOenq3TAhttps://open.spotify.com/track/5A9ctbShMyrhJqLqW0G1lB?si=O0oiuKzWT_-cyCOKkVFVDwhttps://open.spotify.com/track/0NNSpmyyr0I4lrMaXS8Tba?si=zsTK-_stQpy7D_tlYfh6owhttps://open.spotify.com/track/1qRA5BS78u3gME0loMl9AA?si=1EEk6J9JRXOzdfAuAewB-Qhttps://open.spotify.com/track/4EchqUKQ3qAQuRNKmeIpnf?si=YLcBkcLhSQWhhRRaxzp-oghttps://open.spotify.com/track/0iGxZGzLvHteQQMY1WknGc?si=NVwFuHXNQhOCmae_-NASQghttps://open.spotify.com/track/0UrWr7Jnu1heq1o99ZwUd0?si=GrRk9CkUQQmsJjM_XyKpdwhttps://open.spotify.com/track/4sx6NRwL6Ol3V6m9exwGlQ?si=KLfOZ5HRRzuX_-QxvptY0whttps://open.spotify.com/track/3CLSHJv5aUROAN2vfOyCOh?si=cfooPEmRQUmxpDZpKdX8kQhttps://open.spotify.com/track/4xkOaSrkexMciUUogZKVTS?si=OvXd3axrSMyuVHjB5u3gfAhttps://open.spotify.com/track/0xXKBial2Oc7HnRoAqOzT8?si=WHinrficQLinSjjV7cFwDAhttps://open.spotify.com/track/3fsT6VEOxJz3j8cqhzK19Y?si=gPzvyG32RR6XNg6Xsg6eHghttps://open.spotify.com/track/7dFGkZbmm6cVlI28bfMaWE?si=AmF6EQ5qRPqKsR--RUXx6Ahttps://open.spotify.com/track/5KcdBjc264XoWCm7KYiXRO?si=gWxmPoFkS3Sfw-iCfkHhNAhttps://open.spotify.com/track/4h9wh7iOZ0GGn8QVp4RAOB?si=n98zaF0STnG4Unb8RxSeUwhttps://open.spotify.com/track/3H8Sn0mYsZMPPlMCbebOJ5?si=Vq_f5qimTuSJ0-aP2Led_Q
